name: LAYFLY SLIME
description:
hello guys we we have a game collab, a single game and just a litle piece of game mini arcade was platform this game was release before 2023. this game is like platformer and arcade have a score i hope you enjoy and feel free to give us donation and we can create more game , this game is still need to upgrade but if you like please give us a feed back to to make it more better game. thank for share and try the game of LAYFLY.

this game should get a coin and jumping dodge an obstacle and get more coin will gift you to unlock a new skill like doble jump and increase HP.

Note*
This game is for ANDROID and WINDOWS. use apk for HP and exe for windows
